subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Days before Murray’s wedding, the No. 1 Djokovic defeated him for the seventh straight time, winning the Miami Open title with a 7-6 (3), 4-6, 6-0 victory.
snippet: Days before Murray’s wedding, the No. 1 Djokovic defeated him for the seventh straight time, winning the Miami Open title with a 7-6 (3), 4-6, 6-0 victory.
